metadata.title: CVE-2015-3413 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-3413` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

hhvm - 3.11.0+dfsg-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: hhvm package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.11.0+dfsg-1').
